漏洞标题: Teacher Subject Allocation Management System teacher-info.php文件SQL注入漏洞
影响产品: Teacher Subject Allocation Management System Teacher Subject Allocation Management System 1.0
漏洞描述:
Teacher Subject Allocation Management System一个教师学科分配管理系统。
Teacher Subject Allocation Management System存在SQL注入漏洞，该漏洞源于teacher-info.php的editid参数缺少对外部输入SQL语句的验证。攻击者可利用该漏洞执行非法SQL命令窃取数据库敏感数据。
漏洞解决方案:
目前厂商尚未发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网：
https://phpgurukul.com/
